item.title: Meliana add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "And when you get down to it, Lily, that is the only purpose grand enough for a human life. Not just to love but to persist in love." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Lost love is still love. It takes a different form, that's all. You can't see their smile or bring them food or tousle their hair or move them around a dance floor. But when those senses weaken another heightens. Memory. Memory becomes your partner. You nurture it. You hold it. You dance with it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Meliana add a quote by ernest hemingway
item.description: "Courage is grace under pressure." -- ernest hemingway

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description:
"Sebab setelah hujan selalu ada seseorang yang datang sebagai pelangi, dan memelukmu.
: Aku ingin orang itu selamanya aku. " -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Buku yang kubaca selalu memberi sayap-sayap baru. Membawaku terbang ke taman-taman pengetahuan paling menawan, melintasi waktu dan peristiwa, berbagi cerita cinta, menyapa semua tokoh yang ingin kujumpai, sambil bermain di lengkung pelangi." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Aku selalu bermimpi matahari melahirkan para guru dan guru melahirkan para matahari..." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Surga mungkin sebuah perpustakaan raksasa yang semua isinya terbuat dari coklat. Kau bisa membaca lalu memakan semuanya." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "Success is getting what you want.. Happiness is wanting what you get." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "It isn't what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about it." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Jika kita berupaya sekuat tenaga menemukan sesuatu, dan pada titik akhir upaya itu hasilnya masih nihil, maka sebenarnya kita telah menemukan yang kita cari dalam diri kita sendiri, yakni kenyataan, kenyataan yang harus dihadapi sepahit apapun keadaanya." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Fahd Djibran
item.description: "Aku ingin tetap berada di udara jika hidup adalah sebuah koin yang dilempar ke udara dan menjadikan kita sebagai salah satu sisi dari dua mata koin itu. Aku ingin berada di dunia antara, abu-abu, dunia fusi sinergis yang harmonis." -- Fahd Djibran

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description:
"Sonnet XVII
I do not love you as if you were salt-rose, or topaz, or the arrow of carnations the fire shoots off. I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
I love you as the plant that never blooms but carries in itself the light of hidden flowers; thanks to your love a certain solid fragrance, risen from the earth, lives darkly in my body.
I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you straightforwardly, without complexities or pride; so I love you because I know no other way than this:
where I does not exist, nor you, so close that your hand on my chest is my hand, so close that your eyes close as I fall asleep. " -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Meliana add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata
